title: Enable Predictions navigation for signed-in non-premium users

requirements.summary: Show the Predictions link in header navigation for any authenticated user (desktop + mobile) and rely on existing PremiumGate upsell for non-premium access.
acceptanceCriteria: When a user is signed in but does not have active access, the header (desktop and mobile) still shows a "Predictions" link.

Clicking "Predictions" as a signed-in but non-premium user routes to the Predictions page and shows the existing subscribe call-to-action (from PremiumGate), rather than hiding the page via navigation.
When a user has active access (or is admin), Predictions continues to behave as it does today (full access).
All user-facing text remains in English.

file_operations.description: Update desktop and mobile nav rendering so the "Predictions" link is displayed whenever the user is authenticated, regardless of membership/subscription state, while keeping the route pointing to /predictions. Optionally adjust iconography based on access state, but do not change user-facing text (English only). Use existing auth state from the authorization-based Internet Identity flow (via useInternetIdentity) and existing subscription/access signals (via useSubscription) as needed. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
